reg:regulation.reg:acttitle: Balanced Budget and Ministerial Accountability Act
reg:regulation.reg:title: Minister of State for Child Care Expected Results for the 2023/2024 Fiscal Year Regulation

bcl:section.bcl:text: This regulation applies to the Minister of State for Child Care for the 2023/2024 fiscal year.
In this regulation, Act means the Balanced Budget and Ministerial Accountability Act.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Minister of State for Child Care
bcl:section.bcl:text: The expected results that the Minister of State for Child Care is to achieve for the purposes of section 5 (3) of the Act are as follows:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: continue to implement initiatives that support ChildCare BC, our government's 10-year plan to provide universal, affordable, accessible, quality and inclusive child care to every family that wants or needs it;
engage with the following to inform implementation of ChildCare BC and to guide the development of a distinctions-based approach to increasing Indigenous-led child care:

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text: Indigenous governing bodies and other entities representing Indigenous peoples;
school boards, child care providers and other sector stakeholders;

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: continue to monitor the implementation of bilateral agreements with the government of Canada;
submit to Cabinet a report on the results referred to in paragraphs (a) through (c) on or before March 31, 2024.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Balanced Budget and Ministerial Accountability Act, S.B.C. 2001, c. 28, s. 9.]
